tiles.name: Gamma_7_Underlevels
tiles.description: The heart of the Underlevels, a warren of decaying infrastructure and makeshift dwellings. The air hangs thick with pollution and the scent of nutrient paste. Home to Vansh Rishi and the hidden resistance.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Market_District
tiles.description: A bustling black market where scavenged tech, outdated machinery, and illicit goods are traded. The lifeblood of the Underlevels, always filled with shadowy figures and hidden deals.

tiles.name: Conglomerate_Skyport_Alpha
tiles.description: A gleaming landing platform for the elite, towering above the Underlevels. A stark contrast to the poverty below, patrolled by heavily armed Enforcers.

tiles.name: Central_Processing_Plant
tiles.description: A massive, heavily guarded facility responsible for processing waste and supplying the Underlevels with recycled resources. A critical but dangerous location.

tiles.name: Neo_Mumbai_Industrial_Zone
tiles.description: A sprawling complex of factories and power plants that feed the city. The air is thick with noxious fumes and the constant thrum of machinery. The source of much of the pollution plaguing the underlevels.

tiles.name: Overpass_Highway_Network
tiles.description: A complex network of elevated roadways that connect the city sectors, a symbol of the Conglomerates' control and the citizens' forced segregation.

tiles.name: Sky_City_Elysium
tiles.description: The heart of the Neo-Tech Conglomerates power base, a shining beacon of wealth and technology, seemingly untouched by the problems of the surface.

tiles.name: Residential_Sector_Beta
tiles.description: Suburban housing blocks that serve as temporary housing for the vast workforce. Lacking basic utilities and rife with crime.

tiles.name: Rishi_Family_Apartment_Complex
tiles.description: A dilapidated apartment building where Vansh Rishi resides, a forgotten building that symbolizes the hope of the Rishi family and the potential for a better future.

tiles.name: Abandoned_Research_Facility
tiles.description: A hidden location rumored to hold pre-Collapse technology, drawing curious minds, and a frequent target of the Conglomerate Enforcers. Could it hold the answers Vansh seeks?

tiles.name: Gamma_6_Underlevels
tiles.description: Another sector of the Underlevels, mirroring the conditions of Gamma-7 with its decay and hardship. Home to other desperate souls and potential allies or adversaries.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Scrapyard
tiles.description: A sprawling wasteland of discarded machinery and broken tech, the perfect place for Vansh to scavenge for components and knowledge of the past.

tiles.name: Conglomerate_Headquarters
tiles.description: The central command of the Neo-Tech Conglomerates, a fortress of power and surveillance, shrouded in secrecy.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Water_Purification_Plant
tiles.description: A vital facility for the Underlevels, providing water to its inhabitants and crucial for survival. A key target for the resistance.

tiles.name: Power_Grid_Substation
tiles.description: A substation responsible for supplying the power to the industrial zone, where the Conglomerates keep their control. A vital point for the resistance.

tiles.name: Highway_Overpass_Maintenance_Depot
tiles.description: A depot located near the highway, an important location for the Conglomerates' transport and maintenance. A prime location for an ambush.

tiles.name: Sky_City_Observation_Deck
tiles.description: A public observation deck overlooking the Underlevels, a display of the city's wealth and power. A good location to spot any movements or dangers.

tiles.name: Residential_Sector_Alpha
tiles.description: The residential sector next to Beta, filled with similar living conditions and problems as Beta, an easy target for crime and gang violence.

tiles.name: Hidden_Resistance_Bunker
tiles.description: A secret base for the resistance, hidden deep beneath the surface, where Vansh can learn and gather with other sympathizers.

tiles.name: Pre_Collapse_Museum
tiles.description: A dilapidated museum showcasing remnants of the pre-Collapse world, housing forgotten relics of history and science. A possible location to seek knowledge and clues to the past.

tiles.name: Gamma_8_Underlevels
tiles.description: A region similar to the previous Underlevels, a testament to the widespread poverty and hardship imposed by the Conglomerates. Often overlooked and forgotten.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Data_Center
tiles.description: A data storage facility located in the Underlevels, where valuable data of the Conglomerates is kept, making it a prime target for hackers and saboteurs.

tiles.name: Conglomerate_Research_Lab
tiles.description: A secret lab, home to the sinister technological advancements and unethical experiments undertaken by the Conglomerates. A good place to uncover hidden truths.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Waste_Processing_Station
tiles.description: A station where the waste of the surface is processed, a health hazard for the workers employed there and another target for the resistance.

tiles.name: Neo_Mumbai_Energy_Plant
tiles.description: The primary energy source of the city, a vital target for the resistance and a location where Vansh can discover hidden technology.

tiles.name: Highway_Security_Checkpoint
tiles.description: A checkpoint used by the Conglomerates to control movement on the highway and prevent access to certain areas. A challenging obstacle for any rebel group.

tiles.name: Sky_City_Commercial_District
tiles.description: A district filled with shops, entertainment venues, and upscale housing for the elite of the city. A symbol of the disparity between the citizens of the city.

tiles.name: Suburban_Residential_Area
tiles.description: A somewhat more pleasant residential district, not as impoverished as Beta, but still under the control of the Conglomerates. A location Vansh's family could have been a part of before.

tiles.name: Vansh's_Workshop
tiles.description: A secluded workshop where Vansh spends his time experimenting with technology, a safe haven and starting place for adventure.

tiles.name: Hidden_Storage_Facility
tiles.description: A concealed facility rumored to hold valuable pre-Collapse artifacts, sought by both the resistance and the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: Neo_Mumbai_Sewers
tiles.description: A network of tunnels beneath the city, providing access to restricted areas. Often filled with refuse and polluted water, dangerous but useful for those seeking secrecy.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Factory_District
tiles.description: A district dedicated to manufacturing and resource gathering, where workers toil in harsh conditions, exploited by the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: Conglomerate_Security_Headquarters
tiles.description: The central control point for the Conglomerates' security forces, controlling every area in the city.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Medical_Clinic
tiles.description: A clinic in the underlevels offering treatments for the numerous ailments caused by pollution, the location of some of Vansh's ancestors.

tiles.name: Military_Base
tiles.description: A base for the military, the protectors of the Conglomerates, a highly guarded area.

tiles.name: Highway_Toll_Plaza
tiles.description: A toll station on the highway network, generating revenue for the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: Sky_City_Entertainment_District
tiles.description: The location of bars, clubs, and other forms of entertainment for the elite. A showcase of power and wealth.

tiles.name: Suburban_Industrial_Area
tiles.description: A region where industrial and commercial enterprises are located within proximity to the residential zones, exposing the citizens to pollutants.

tiles.name: Black_Market_Arsenal
tiles.description: A location where various weapons can be bought and sold, and Vansh can seek out dangerous tools and companions.

tiles.name: Lost_Pre_Collapse_Library
tiles.description: A library rumored to have survived the Collapse, with invaluable knowledge for Vansh to seek out.

tiles.name: Neo_Mumbai_River
tiles.description: A polluted river that flows through the city, serving as a source of water and a conduit for the resistance.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Freight_Depot
tiles.description: A depot handling goods transported into the Underlevels, another target for the resistance.

tiles.name: Conglomerate_Finance_District
tiles.description: The financial center of the city, a hub of wealth and power, where the Conglomerates' funds are managed and controlled.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Community_Center
tiles.description: A place where the community can gather for support, even in the darkest of times. A good place for Vansh to find allies.

tiles.name: Military_Training_Ground
tiles.description: A highly guarded area used for training the military. Vansh will encounter many enemies here.

tiles.name: Highway_Service_Station
tiles.description: A place for travelers to recharge or get food, but often frequented by gangs.

tiles.name: Sky_City_Government_Building
tiles.description: The heart of the city's governance, home to the leaders and decision-makers of the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: Suburban_Park
tiles.description: A public park in the suburbs, a rare glimpse of green space. A place for relaxing and meeting potential allies.

tiles.name: Vansh's_Childhood_Home
tiles.description: A rundown place in the Underlevels, where Vansh first began to learn and dream of a better future.

tiles.name: Old_Tech_Warehouse
tiles.description: A large warehouse where Vansh can seek out forgotten technology or hide from enemies.

tiles.name: Neo_Mumbai_Park
tiles.description: A park, a break from the city's pollution, where some form of plant life is maintained.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Power_Station
tiles.description: A station providing energy to the Underlevels, but also a site ripe with dangers.

tiles.name: Conglomerate_Media_Center
tiles.description: A place where the media is controlled by the Conglomerates, disseminating propaganda and shaping public opinion.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Hospital
tiles.description: A hospital in the underlevels, where sick and wounded citizens receive treatment. A potential safe haven.

tiles.name: Military_Barracks
tiles.description: Where the military reside, a well-guarded facility with several enemies for Vansh to face.

tiles.name: Highway_Rest_Area
tiles.description: An area for travelers to get rest along the highway, though these are often taken over by gangs.

tiles.name: Sky_City_Shopping_District
tiles.description: A shopping center for the upper class, where Vansh could potentially seek out tools and weapons.

tiles.name: Suburban_School
tiles.description: A school in the suburbs, a place where Vansh can gain valuable knowledge.

tiles.name: Rishi_Family_Research_Lab
tiles.description: A secluded lab where Vansh can seek out knowledge of the past.

tiles.name: Black_Market_Safehouse
tiles.description: A safehouse for buying and selling weapons and illegal items. A place of danger and opportunity.

tiles.name: Neo_Mumbai_Forest
tiles.description: A rare patch of forest in the city, a place for hope to thrive.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Food_Processing_Plant
tiles.description: A factory where food is processed, an integral part of the city that can be used by Vansh as a target.

tiles.name: Conglomerate_Prison
tiles.description: A prison for enemies of the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Library
tiles.description: A library in the underlevels, a good place for Vansh to seek knowledge and find allies.

tiles.name: Military_Headquarters
tiles.description: Headquarters for the military, a very important place to defend.

tiles.name: Highway_Control_Tower
tiles.description: A control tower for the highways, allowing Vansh to navigate through the city.

tiles.name: Sky_City_University
tiles.description: A university for the upper class, where Vansh can seek out knowledge and find allies.

tiles.name: Suburban_Cafe
tiles.description: A cafe in the suburbs, where Vansh can meet potential allies or enemies.

tiles.name: Vansh's_Hideout
tiles.description: Where Vansh can hide from enemies and plan his next moves.

tiles.name: Pre_Collapse_Research_Facility
tiles.description: A facility left over from before the Collapse, an excellent place to seek out clues.

tiles.name: Neo_Mumbai_Lake
tiles.description: A lake to seek refuge and meet new people.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Bunker
tiles.description: A place to hide from enemies and allies. A potential spot to seek out support.

tiles.name: Conglomerate_Laboratory
tiles.description: A laboratory where the Conglomerates conduct experiments.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Warehouse
tiles.description: A warehouse for smuggling and hiding out.

tiles.name: Military_Fortress
tiles.description: A fortress for the military.

tiles.name: Highway_Rest_Stop
tiles.description: A place for travelers to rest.

tiles.name: Sky_City_Nightclub
tiles.description: A place to dance and have fun for the wealthy.

tiles.name: Suburban_Grocery_Store
tiles.description: A grocery store where citizens can buy supplies.

tiles.name: Vansh's_Sister's_Home
tiles.description: Where Vansh can meet his sister, a potential place to meet new allies.

tiles.name: Black_Market_Clinic
tiles.description: A clinic offering medicine to the citizens.

tiles.name: Neo_Mumbai_Mountains
tiles.description: Mountains in the city where people can seek refuge.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Train_Station
tiles.description: A train station connecting different areas of the city.

tiles.name: Conglomerate_Theater
tiles.description: A place for entertainment run by the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Training_Center
tiles.description: Where the resistance trains for combat.

tiles.name: Military_Outpost
tiles.description: An outpost controlled by the military.

tiles.name: Highway_Bridge
tiles.description: A bridge to get around the city.

tiles.name: Sky_City_Apartments
tiles.description: Where the rich live.

tiles.name: Suburban_Hospital
tiles.description: A hospital for the residents.

tiles.name: Vansh's_Friend's_House
tiles.description: A house where Vansh can get help.

tiles.name: Black_Market_Garage
tiles.description: A garage for the underground.

tiles.name: Neo_Mumbai_Plaza
tiles.description: A plaza for the residents.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Factory
tiles.description: A factory in the Underlevels.

tiles.name: Conglomerate_Museum
tiles.description: A museum run by the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: Underlevel_Bar
tiles.description: A bar for the residents.

tiles.name: Military_Base
tiles.description: A military base for the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: Highway_Tunnel
tiles.description: A tunnel to travel safely.

tiles.name: Sky_City_Bank
tiles.description: A bank run by the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: Suburban_Shop
tiles.description: A shop to buy supplies.

tiles.name: Vansh's_Mentor's_Home
tiles.description: Where Vansh can seek out help.

tiles.name: Black_Market_Street
tiles.description: A street for the underground.
